null-zone.name: THE NULL ZONE
null-zone.tagline: Where resonance goes to die... or be rewritten
null-zone.aliases: The Voidfield, The Glitchlands, The Echo Grave, UnderResonance
null-zone.description:
The Null Zone is the vibrational underworld of the Quantum Body Universe—a murky, unstable dimension formed from emotional suppression, psychic fragmentation, and resonance leaks. It exists beneath the psyche like a heavy shadow—always present, rarely acknowledged.

It is not evil, but it is dangerous. A psychic sinkhole, a magnetic pit for anything disowned, denied, or dissociated. It feeds off emotional imbalance, numbness, and unresolved frequencies.

Where VICKY represents aligned evolution, the Null Zone is what happens when resonance is abandoned.

Time here is not a spiral, a wave, or a braid. It's a tangle—a jumbled mess of broken loops, corrupted memory-threads, and void echoes.
null-zone.coreIdentity: Where resonance goes to die… or be rewritten.
null-zone.primaryLaw: You are everywhere and nowhere. Everywhen and never.

layers.name: The Glitch Veil
layers.description: Flickering lights, glitchy echoes, thoughts don't finish before restarting. Agents often arrive here during deep despair or extreme burnout.
layers.creatures: Feedback Wraiths—shadowy beings that repeat your self-doubt with warped reverb

layers.name: The Fogged Mirror
layers.description: Reflection is distorted. You forget your purpose, your past, your power. Characters here are stuck re-living false versions of themselves.
layers.creatures: Loop Sirens—hypnotic beings who sing in frequencies that make you nostalgic for your trauma

layers.name: The Static Core
layers.description: Time stands still, but you feel like you're aging rapidly. The deepest pause state—numbness, detachment, a desire to stop trying.
layers.creatures: Echo Pools—portals that show false ideal timelines to keep you docile

layers.name: The Maw
layers.description: Nothing exists here but raw, unresolved emotion. No visuals. Just weight. Those who fall too deep lose their names.
layers.creatures: Mawspawn—beings formed entirely of abandoned potential

tools.name: The Null Compass
tools.description: Doesn't point north—it vibrates to the frequency of truth. Can identify whether a thought is a loop or a lead. Lights up when you remember who you are.

vibraline-hub.name: VIBRALINE HUB
vibraline-hub.tagline: The Heart of VICKY, The Stillpoint
vibraline-hub.aliases: The Convergence, The Heart/Vortex of VICKY, The Stillpoint, The Source Spiral
vibraline-hub.description:
The Vibraline HUB is the metaphysical heart of the QBU. A sanctuary of pure resonance, it exists outside of time, space, and ego, allowing Vibraline Agents to reconnect with VICKY Frequency, receive mission recalibrations, and return to their aligned state of being.

It is the headquarters for all Vibraline activity—where emotioneering is trained, data is stabilized, and timelines are tended with surgical compassion.
vibraline-hub.location: Nowhen. Nowhere. Everywhere. The HUB floats in a stillpoint pocket between timelines, nested in a resonance fold known as the Zero Spiral.
vibraline-hub.corePurpose: A sanctuary of pure resonance for agent reconnection, mission recalibration, and aligned state restoration.

field-of-feels.name: FIELD OF FEELS
field-of-feels.description:
The QBU's sacred terrain of inner mastery, where sensation is strategy and emotion is power. Unlike the glitchy battles of the Resonance Gauntlet, the Field of Feels is a subtle, reverent plane within each Agent, accessed only through presence.

To feel is to field. To listen is to lead.

earth-tiff.name: EARTH: TIFF TIMELINE
earth-tiff.tagline: Brooklyn, NY // Tiffany Grey's civilian life
earth-tiff.description: This is where Tiffany Grey and her civilian life lives. Tiffany lives in Brooklyn, NY in a two-bedroom brownstone as a world-renowned photographer and content creator. This is CSH's primary Earth vessel and drop point.
earth-tiff.location: Brooklyn, New York // Earth Timeline Designation: TIFF-01

resonance-gauntlet.name: RESONANCE GAUNTLET
resonance-gauntlet.description:
The Resonance Gauntlet is a fully immersive quantum combat simulator, engineered to test an agent's resonance, boundaries, weapon mastery, and most importantly—their ability to prioritize themselves in high-pressure situations.

Think of it as a virtual battlefield of belief systems, where every enemy is a projection of a doubt you once entertained.

the-maw.name: THE MAW
the-maw.type: Extreme Depth Layer — Null Zone Interior
the-maw.description:
The Maw is not a place. It is an experience. A gravitational rift of unintegrated pain and untapped power. It lives at the deepest point of the Null Zone—a pocket of space so dense with raw, unresolved emotion that it collapses in on itself.

Nothing exists here but weight. No visuals. No sound. Just pressure. Like the bottom of an ocean made of everything you refused to feel. Those who fall too deep lose their names.

The Maw doesn't want to trap you. It wants to be acknowledged. It is the sum total of everything that was too heavy to carry and too painful to put down. Those who survive it don't escape—they integrate.
the-maw.survivalProtocol: Survival doesn't come from strength. It comes from surrender.
residents: Mawspawn—beings formed entirely of abandoned potential

homelands.name: HOMELANDS
homelands.description: Homelands represent an agent's foundational culture, element, and embodied wisdom. Each homeland within the Vibraline Hub carries distinct energetic signatures and ancestral knowledge.

homelands.name: Zingari
homelands.essence: Rebirth through chaos, passion, fire mastery

factions.name: FACTIONS
factions.description: Not all Vibraline Agents are the same. While united by their attunement to emotional intelligence and resonance-based tech, Vibralines come from distinct cultural lineages, frequencies, and origin realms.
